resources.string: How much do you know about Erasmus? Do you want to chalenge yourself?
How long you can live abroad for free?
Do you need to be a student for ERASMUS+ projects?
Yes, it is necessary to study at university
How old you need to be to participate on ERASMUS+ projects?
Is ERASMUS+ program only for EU countries?
What is purpose of ERASMUS+ projects?
If you are going abroad with Erasmus, do you need to know local native language?
So what is you score? Did you know enough?
European Voluntary Service program by European union allow to go abroad for free for 1 year.
No, Erasmus has also project, where you don\'t need to be a student.
This conditions change from time to time but in 2018 it should be from 13 to 30 years
Actually you can go even in Australia. It is just necessary, that the country which you will choose is a \"Partner Country\" for Erasmus projects.
Tourism is not main purpose of Erasmus, however you will have lot of chances to travel during your Erasmus. Rest of the answers are right.
Basically you don\'t need to know any language, but it is strongly recommendet to know at least basics fo english.
Do not rotate phone during the quiz, otherwise your progress will be deleted.
